divs: Sighting DetailsTwo nights from this sighting my wife had seen lights in the sky that to her looked strange, she told me about them and i started paying attention to the sky. On the night of this video, I notice a strange formation of clouds that looked like a mushroom with high activitiy of lighting. In the bottom of this cloud i notice a strange light which I thought it was a reflection on my glasses, I started recording from my iphone and notice that the light moved and abruptly flew changing directions to the left of the screen and vanishing, but after reviewing the footage we notice it was something different. (The sighting in the file i'm sending happens at the begining of the footage).
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Punta Gorda
There were no other sightings in Punta Gorda on or around July 21st 2012
